div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:
A core set of FHIR resources profiled for use in Finland, published and maintained by HL7 Finland

Finnish PHR profile for measured or patient-reported time spent on moderate to vigorous physical activity over a period. At this time weekly (period) and 24h period (dateTime) is coded. The profile is based on the Finnish PHR Fitness profile.

name.value: Patient generated glucose observations and insulin administrations as a bundle, in English

description.value: A Bundle of resources uploaded by a patient from a insulin delvery system containing both a continuous glucose sensor and an insulin pump. Conforms to Kanta PHR R4 profiles.

name.value: Patient generated glucose observations and insulin administrations as a bundle, in Swedish

description.value: A Bundle of resources uploaded by a patient from a insulin delvery system containing both a continuous glucose sensor and an insulin pump. Conforms to Kanta PHR STU3 profiles.

name.value: Patient generated glucose observations and insulin administrations as a bundle, in Finnish

description.value: A Bundle of resources uploaded by a patient from a insulin delvery system containing both a continuous glucose sensor and an insulin pump.

Selkäkipusi takia sinun tulisi hakeutua välittömästi päivystysvastaanotolle. Alaselkäkipu on paikallista ja kestänyt 1 - 4 viikkoa. Potilaalla on kuumetta 38C , potilas on sairastanut syövän tai sairastaa syöpää, vaikeuksia pidättää virtsaa, vaikeuksia pidättää ulostetta ja vaikeuksia virtsaamisessa (virtsaaminen ei onnistu). Kiireellisesti terveydenhuollon ammattilaisen arviota vaativat oireet: virtsainkontinenssi, virtsaamisvaikeus ja ulosteinkontinenssi. Selkäoireeseen liittyy kipua, jonka voimakkuus on 5/10. Selkäkipu on alkanut välittömästi kaatumisen, selkään kohdistuneen iskun tai muun tapaturman jälkeen. Tapaturman sattumistapa: Kompastuin kengännauhoihin. Yleisvointi on kohtalainen (pystyy tekemään pakolliset päivittäiset toiminnot). Kipulääke auttaa. Tarvitsee sairauslomaa.

Selkäkipusi takia sinun tulisi hakeutua välittömästi päivystysvastaanotolle.

Esitiedot Omaolo-oirearviosta (22.5.2020 klo 12:13:14): Alaselkäkipu on paikallista ja kestänyt 1 - 4 viikkoa. Potilaalla on kuumetta 38°C , potilas on sairastanut syövän tai sairastaa syöpää, vaikeuksia pidättää virtsaa, vaikeuksia pidättää ulostetta ja vaikeuksia virtsaamisessa (virtsaaminen ei onnistu). Kiireellisesti terveydenhuollon ammattilaisen arviota vaativat oireet: virtsainkontinenssi, virtsaamisvaikeus ja ulosteinkontinenssi. Selkäoireeseen liittyy kipua, jonka voimakkuus on 5/10. Selkäkipu on alkanut välittömästi kaatumisen, selkään kohdistuneen iskun tai muun tapaturman jälkeen. Tapaturman sattumistapa: Kompastuin kengännauhoihin. Yleisvointi on kohtalainen (pystyy tekemään pakolliset päivittäiset toiminnot). Kipulääke auttaa. Tarvitsee sairauslomaa.
Indicates the plan category.
Finnish PHR Consent Category codes
Observation category code for Finnish PHR Fitness Category
Finnish PHR Insulin Code System, includes codes indicating what kind of insulin has been administered.
Finnish PHR Fitness Codesystem, that defines the code used for daily minutes of moderate to vigorous physical activity. Will be replaced with LOINC system code when available.
Finnish PHR Observation Category Code System that defines codes for Observation.category when there is no suitable code in the FHIR standard observation category code system.
Finnish PHR VNR codesystem, that defines VNR codes with CodeSystem.content as not-present.
Indicates type of SelfCarePlan.
Value set for confidentiality codes used in finnish PHR
Finnish PHR Consent Category value set.
Finnish PHR Exercise Activity value set
Finnish PHR Exercise Intensity value set
Finnish PHR Exercise Tracking value set
Fitness Category code.
Fitness Category code.
Fitness Category code.

This value set indicates the allowed fitness or physical activity result types in Finnish PHR. The concept Daily Activity fitness panel (62812-3) is a grouping structure for a set of physical activity, and for convenience also vital sign, measurements and includes related links (with type=has-member) to the Observations in this set or the parallel Finnish PHR Vital Signs value set (e.g. steps taken, minimum or maximum heart rate, calories burned, moderate to vigorous physical activity minutes, sedentary activity minutes, sleep episodes and exercises).

A Finnish PHR value set for the codes to be used with insulin dosing. Includes VNR codes (reference to the national VNR code system) or specific codes to indicate what kind of insulin has been administered.
Finnish PHR Macronutrition Value Set that defines codes for Macronutrients.
Finnish PHR MET by Standard RMR value set
Finnish PHR Nutrition Value Set that defines codes for Nutrition.
Finnish PHR Observation Category Value Set that defines codes for Observation.category when there is no suitable code in the FHIR standard observation category value set.
Finnish PHR Source for Adjusted MET value set
Finnish PHR Source for Estimated MET value set
Finnish PHR Source for Reported MET value set

This value set indicates the allowed vital sign result types in Finnish PRH. The concept Vitals signs panel (85353-1) is a grouping structure for a set of vital signs and includes related links (with type=has-member) to the Observations in this set (e.g. respiratory rate, heart rate, BP). The Blood pressure panel (85354-9) is used to group the component observations Systolic blood pressure (8480-6) and Diastolic blood pressure (8462-4).

name.value: MedicationAdministration example of insulin basal dose

description.value: A basal dose of fast-acting insulin, administred with an insulin pump. Conforms to the Kanta PHR profile, version STU3. In Swedish.
A bolus dose of fast-acting insulin, administred with an insulin pump. In Finnish.

name.value: MedicationAdministration example of temporary basal rate

description.value: A temporarily adjusted basal dose of fast-acting insulin, administred with an insulin pump. Conforms to the Kanta PHR profile. In English.
An example step count measurement with mandatory elements.

name.value: Kanta PHR - blood glucose result as text

description.value: This is an example, where measurement device has failed to measure numerical value for the blood glucose but the device still can store some result in the narrative element. In this case code 'astext' must be used in dataAbsentReason.coding.code.

name.value: Kanta PHR - blood glucose with data absent

description.value: This is an example, where measurement device has failed to measure blood glucose reading. In this case 'error' must be used in dataAbsentReason.coding.code.
